    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21489805">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489805">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489805">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489805">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21489805" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21489806">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489806">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489806">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489806">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the Check for Full Text button found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21489806" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21489807">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489807">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489807">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias (cannot be used as sources in the paper per se, but can serve as pointers)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489807">
          <div id="boxatt21489807" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24985632">
              <a id="link_24985632" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985632,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription. Several hundred online encyclopedias by reputable publishers. Good for topic-finding, narrowing, and bibliographies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985633">
              <a id="link_24985633" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985633,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21489808">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489808">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489808">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly secondary works and primary documents as published in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489808">
          <div id="boxatt21489808" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24985636">
              <a id="link_24985636" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985636,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985635">
              <a id="link_24985635" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985635,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Good for primary documents pre-1923 that are out of copyright.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21489809">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489809">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489809">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly secondary work published as journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489809">
          <div id="boxatt21489809" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24985637">
              <a id="link_24985637" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985637,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985642">
              <a id="link_24985642" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985642,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24989786">
              <a id="link_24989786" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24989786,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985643">
              <a id="link_24985643" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985643,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985639">
              <a id="link_24985639" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985639,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for European history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985638">
              <a id="link_24985638" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985638,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21489927">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489927">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489927">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional primary resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489927">
          <div id="boxatt21489927" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24985671">
              <a id="link_24985671" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985671,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016968}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25587246">
              <a id="link_25587246" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/55428" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25587246,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889044}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1857-1922 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25587250">
              <a id="link_25587250" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/45545" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25587250,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889045}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1923-2012 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25587252">
              <a id="link_25587252" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25587252,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : '1917', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344567}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5704447" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21489810">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489810">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489810">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489810">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21489810" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21489811">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489811">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489811">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489811">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21489811" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
